name: Starters
description: Dipping, rolling and sharing are what our starters and sides were made for. We make everything fresh in-house, from our summer and spring rolls to our pork and lemongrass meatballs. All come with their own sauces, but you can also try them with our delicious table condiments: homemade chilli paste, garlic vinegar, sriracha or fish sauce.

name: Salads
description: Crispy, colourful, tasty and filling, our delicious spicy Vietnamese salads are light years away from mundane lettuce-based salads.

name: Curry & Rice
description: We serve a variety of 'broken rice' dishes like fragrant Vietnamese curries, aromatic spicy wok-fried rice and colourful, healthy rice bowls topped with veggies and fresh chillies.

name: Wok-fried Noodles
description: Phở xao is a wok fried flat noodle served with crunchy greens, protein and a choice of toppings. All are topped with roasted peanuts and fresh beanshoots.

name: Vermicelli Noodles
description: Vermicelli rice noodles (Bún) with a lemongrass and chilli wok-fried topping. Served with fresh herbs, beansprouts, veggie spring roll and peanuts. Noodles served at room temp just like in Vietnam.

name: Sides
description: Grab some sides to boost your meals, or share a few with your starters

name: Desserts
description: Our desserts range from rich ice creams and refreshing sorbets to our delicious and decadent chocolate truffle or fried banana fritters (which are gluten free and vegan!).
